properties.query:
let MaintWin= datatable (WinName: string, startDate: datetime, endDate: datetime, DummyJoin:string) [
    'Sem1', datetime(2021-09-24,04:31:33.425Z), datetime(2021-09-27T01:00:00.15Z),"1",
    'Sem2', datetime(2022-05-25T01:00:00.15Z), datetime(2021-05-26T01:00:00.15),"1",
];
let PrivEscal=(SecurityAlert| where TimeGenerated > ago(5h) and AlertName == "Malicious credential theft tool execution detected"
| extend DummyJoin2="1"
| extend Host_Name = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].FQDN)
| extend LastExternalIpAddress = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].LastExternalIpAddress));
let StopPlc=(SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
    | where AlertName == "An S7 Stop PLC Command was Sent"
    | extend SourceDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SourceDeviceAddress)
    | extend DestinationDeviceAddress = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DestinationDeviceAddress)
    | where ipv4_is_in_range(SourceDeviceAddress, "192.168.117.0/24") == false and SourceDeviceAddress !in ("192.168.117.20")
    | extend DummyJoin="1"
    | project TimeGenerated, SourceDeviceAddress, DestinationDeviceAddress,DummyJoin);
let maint=(MaintWin
| join kind=inner      (StopPlc) on DummyJoin 
| where TimeGenerated !between (startDate .. endDate)
| project TimeGenerated, SourceDeviceAddress, DestinationDeviceAddress, WinName
| extend DummyJoin2="1");
PrivEscal
| join (maint) on DummyJoin2 | project Host_Name, TimeGenerated, SourceDeviceAddress, DestinationDeviceAddress, WinName, LastExternalIpAddress

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: PLC Stop Command issued outside maintenance window: {{WinName}}
